page.title: 17My Favourite Clothes
page.content: My favourite dress is white with blue spots. On the sleeves are pretty frills edged in blue cotton. Round the waist are two stripes of silk, one blue and one white, tied in a neat bow. My favourite jumper is very new and I am not allowed to play in it. It has wide light blue and white vertical stripes. The sleeves are very baggy at the top and is the latest fashion trend. My favourite Jeans are old and faded and there are nearly holes where the knees go. I like them because they fit snugly. My favourite socks are white with pink and blue triangles on them. There is writing below the blue triangle. It says "sport" in blue lettering.
